event_description: User begins the 14-day quit caffeine calculator by adding their first drink
User completes all steps of the quit calculator and generates their PDF plan
User downloads their personalized caffeine detox PDF plan
User adds a drink to the caffeine half-life calculator
User attempts to submit the accountability bet form (conversion intent)
User searches for a specific product in the caffeine list
User filters the caffeine list by category
User switches between 'Quit' and 'Detox' tabs on the motivators page
User clicks an external affiliate product link (decaf alternatives, supplements)
User clicks a research source link on the decaf benefits page
User clicks through to Oren's Coffee recommendation
User clicks a tool card on the homepage to navigate to a specific tool
User scrolls to and views the About section on the homepage
User clicks to enlarge a customer testimonial image
